opis: Prodajemo kuću u mjestu Artatore,kuća se nalazi okruzena borovima u prekrasnom mjestu Artatore na otoku Mali Lošinj, Kuća ima 5 apartmana koji vec imaju uhodani biznis tokom ljeta s obzirom na veliku potražnju odmora na jednom od nasih prekrasnih otoka.Vlasništvo je 1/1 te su etažirani. Prekrasno mjesto na obali mora, u srcu borove šume, Artatore su jedno od rijetkih otočkih naselja koje je novijeg datuma, staro tek tridesetak godina. Nastalo je izgradnjom vikendica i bungalova s nastojanjem za proširivanjem turističke ponude Lošinja. Artatore su najljepše upravo u ljetnim mjesecima. Gotovo svaka kuća ovdje nudi smještaj u modernim i uređenim apartmanima, te su tako Artatore omiljeno odredište mnogim posjetiteljima ovog otoka koji znaju cijeniti usporen i miran odmor u tišini. Zaklonjena uvala nudi vezove i sidrište jahtama i jedrilicama, pa su tako Artatore popularne i među nautičarima. Za vise informacija 095 829 1188 ili geofly.immobilen@gmail.com English!!! We are selling a house in the town of Artatore, the house is surrounded by pine trees in the beautiful town of Artatore on the island of Mali Lošinj. The house has 5 apartments that already have a well-established business during the summer due to the great demand for vacations on one of our beautiful islands. Ownership is 1/1 and are split level. A beautiful place on the coast, in the heart of a pine forest, Artatore is one of the few island settlements that is more recent, only about thirty years old. It was created by the construction of cottages and bungalows with an effort to expand the tourist offer of Lošinj. Artatore is the most beautiful in the summer months. Almost every house here offers accommodation in modern and well-furnished apartments, so Artatore is a favorite destination for many visitors to this island who know how to appreciate a slow and quiet vacation in silence. The sheltered bay offers moorings and anchorage for yachts and sailboats, so Artatore is also popular among sailors.
